Headline: #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Congress/Central Park
ShortDescription: WB 7 Harrison, 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Kostner & Harrison: due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison: due to, street blockage near Congress/Central Park.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Hollywood, Sheridan, Foster and Broadway due to street blockage near Broadway/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Hollywood, Sheridan, Foster and Broadway due to street blockage near Broadway/Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.
